Major_Arcs.title: The Human Meteor's Introduction and Underwater Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Human Meteor and his initial conflict with underwater divers, leading to a larger plot involving a yacht and a Japanese submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Underwater Encounter and Premise Setup
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene establishes the initial underwater setting, introduces the Human Meteor, and hints at the upcoming conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Duke's Taxi Ride and Suspicious Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shifts to a city setting, introduces Duke as a taxi driver, and sets up a suspicious pursuit by G-Men.

sub_scenes.title: Cop Shooters and Police Appreciation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Human Meteor's action against 'cop shooters' and the subsequent positive police response.

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Suspicion and Toby's Infiltration Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the yacht plot, with Dr. Holden's suspicions and Duke and Toby devising a plan for infiltration.

narrative_arcs.title: Toby Infiltrates the Yacht and is Spotted

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Trap and Submarine Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Toby's experiences on the yacht, including a trap and the discovery of a Japanese submarine.

sub_scenes.title: Human Meteor's Underwater Attack
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Human Meteor's direct intervention, discovering the submarine and engaging in underwater combat.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor Responds to the Call
Divers Identify and Target Human Meteor
Human Meteor Responds to Divers' Aggression
Diver's Threat and Human Meteor's Retaliation Hint
Spear Gun Attack and Cry for Help
Human Meteor's Torpedo Attack on Submarine

sub_scenes.title: Ship Deck Aftermath and Yacht Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the immediate aftermath on the ship deck, the ship's reaction to the geyser, and Human Meteor's pursuit of the yacht.

narrative_arcs.title: Human Meteor's Finishing Blow to Ship

sub_scenes.title: Yacht Investigation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the yacht plotline with the discovery of Peter's death, the search for the depth map, and the quick departure from the yacht.

narrative_arcs.title: Discovery of Peter's Death on Yacht
Human Meteor Searches for Depth Map in Peter's Cabin

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Domestic Ending
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene provides a transition and conclusion to this major arc, with a hospital visit to Holden and a domestic scene with Duke and Toby.

narrative_arcs.title: Evening Car Ride and Domestic Scene with Toby and Duke

Major_Arcs.title: The Liberty Lads and the Sabotage Conspiracy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the Liberty Lads and their confrontation with Nazis, intertwined with a subplot about an ambulance and a dropped wallet, leading to the revelation of a sabotage conspiracy.

sub_scenes.title: Liberty Lads Confrontation with Nazis
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Liberty Lads and their armed confrontation with Nazis.

sub_scenes.title: Ambulance Arrival and Dropped Wallet
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces a separate plotline with an ambulance arriving and boys finding a dropped wallet.

sub_scenes.title: Garage Investigation and Major Bronson Reveal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene follows the boys to the garage and introduces Major Bronson in civilian attire, creating intrigue.

narrative_arcs.title: Marine Salutes Civilian - Major Bronson Revealed

sub_scenes.title: Garage Interception and Mr. Horst's Threat
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene escalates tension as the boys are intercepted at the garage and encounter the menacing Mr. Horst.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Garage and Interception

sub_scenes.title: Interrogation and Carbon Monoxide Plot
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on Mr. Horst's interrogation of the boys and the revelation of a sinister plot to use carbon monoxide.

narrative_arcs.title: Confirmation and Agreement on Carbon Monoxide Plan

sub_scenes.title: Chaos and Lawyer's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the chaotic outbreak of fighting, the boys being overpowered, and the unexpected violent action of Major Bronson's lawyer.

sub_scenes.title: Escape, Secret Office, and Sabotage Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows the boys' escape, discovery of a secret office, and revelation of sabotage plans, leading to the uncovering of a larger conspiracy.

narrative_arcs.title: Plan to Seek Help and Sergeant Encounter

sub_scenes.title: Marine Barracks Action and Bronson Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the urgent response at the Marine Barracks and the action-packed rescue of Major Bronson.

narrative_arcs.title: Urgent News and Car Crash at Barracks
Immediate Aid and Call for Ambulance

Major_Arcs.title: The Champ and Rosita's South American Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows 'The Champ' and Henry in South America, where they get entangled in a kidnapping mystery involving Rosita, the President's daughter, and Axis-linked bandits.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction in South America
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces 'The Champ' and Henry in a South American town and hints at the intrigue they are about to face.

narrative_arcs.title: Introduction of The Champ and Setting

sub_scenes.title: Military Interrogation and Kidnapping Context
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the military's interrogation of 'The Champ' and Henry, revealing the context of Rosita's kidnapping by El Tigre.

sub_scenes.title: El Tigre's Plan and Kidnapping of Champ and Henry
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows El Tigre's demands and the forceful kidnapping of 'The Champ' and Henry.

narrative_arcs.title: El Tigre's Demands and Forced Carjacking
The Forced Drive and Destination Reveal

sub_scenes.title: Mama's Plea and Tamale Street Plan
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene highlights Mama's plea for help and introduces a separate plan being formulated at Tamale Street.

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Initial Confrontation at El Tigre's Hideout
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the infiltration of El Tigre's hideout and the initial confrontations with guards.

sub_scenes.title: Rosita's Absence and Interrogation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the search for Rosita and the interrogation tactics being employed.

narrative_arcs.title: Claim of Identity Theft by Axis Agents

sub_scenes.title: Internal Conflicts and Rescue Mission Initiation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows internal conflicts among El Tigre's men and the initiation of a rescue mission for Rosita.

narrative_arcs.title: Rosita Held by Axis Agents, Rescue Plan

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Rescue Operation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the active pursuit, strategic planning, and gymnastic infiltration leading to Rosita's rescue.

narrative_arcs.title: Escape to Citadel and Hotel Strategy

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Aftermath of Rescue
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene showcases the immediate aftermath of the rescue, including combat resolution, threats, bravery, and official recognition.

Major_Arcs.title: Devil Dog Dolan's Jungle Mission and Betrayal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Devil Dog Dolan in a jungle setting, his disobedience, capture, and the unfolding plot around sub detector plans and native tribes.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Combat and Insubordination
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces Devil Dog Dolan in jungle combat and then shifts to a shipboard discussion about his disobedience.

sub_scenes.title: Jungle Mission and Native Ambush
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene sets up a jungle mission and depicts a native ambush, escalating the danger for the characters involved.

narrative_arcs.title: Jungle River Journey and Perceived Danger

sub_scenes.title: Dolan's Capture and Torture for Plans
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene details Dolan's capture and brutal interrogation, focusing on the enemy's objective to obtain the sub detector plans.

sub_scenes.title: Sabotage and Native Attack Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dolan's continued sabotage, Grauer's directives, and the brutal attack on native huts.

narrative_arcs.title: Marines' Onslaught and Grauer's Strategic Talk
Grauer's Dismissal and Native Hut Burning

sub_scenes.title: Native Uprising and Dolan's Revelation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene shows Dolan's confrontation with natives, leading to the accidental death of the chief and a surprising revelation about the tribe's situation.

sub_scenes.title: Shipboard Conflict and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the shipboard conflict arising from the surrender order, culminating in a fistfight and eventual resolution and discipline.

Major_Arcs.title: Twinkle Twins and the Banker's Murder Mystery
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows the Twinkle Twins, Diane and Dan, as they investigate the murder of banker Robert Burgess, uncovering racketeering, blood type mysteries, and a community effort to save an innocent man.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to the Twinkle Twins Story
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene introduces the Twinkle Twins and sets up the premise of their story.

sub_scenes.title: Newsroom Briefing and Police Station Lead
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene begins the investigation with a briefing in the newspaper office and a lead from the police station.

narrative_arcs.title: Police Station Inquiry and Hospital Lead

sub_scenes.title: Hospital Visit and Blood Type Mystery
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts Dan and Diane's hospital visit and the introduction of the blood type mystery related to Miss Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Hospital Visit and Discovery of Miss Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Racketeering Suspicions and Farnacci Link
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene develops suspicions about racketeering and links Farnacci to the crime through overheard conversations and investigation.

sub_scenes.title: Search for Reilly and Revelation about Farnacci's Sacrifice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene depicts the twins' search for Tom Reilly and their conversation with Mrs. Murphy, revealing Farnacci's unexpected actions.

narrative_arcs.title: Searching for Tom Reilly and Initial Encounter
Conversation with Mrs. Murphy about Farnacci

sub_scenes.title: Chase, Blockade, and Mob Justice
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene is action-packed, showing a chase, a human blockade, and the eruption of mob justice in the Irish neighborhood.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Chase of Tom Reilly

sub_scenes.title: Medical Emergency and Community Blood Donation
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene focuses on the medical emergency, the urgent need for blood, and the community's response to donate.

narrative_arcs.title: Rushed to Ambulance and Onward Concern
Hospital Wait and Blood Transfusion News
Community Rushes to Donate and Hospital Anxiety
Blood Type Confirmation, Transfusion Preparation, and Recovery

sub_scenes.title: Resolution and Birthday Celebration
sub_scenes.description: This sub-scene concludes the Twinkle Twins story with Tom Reilly's recovery, anticipation of future revelations, and a joyous birthday celebration for Lassie Reilly.

narrative_arcs.title: Threats and Determination to Capture Farnacci
Police Respond and Arrest the Murderer
